subject: RE: [junit] TestCase Dependency Hierarchy
msgSnippet: ... At your user account settings for this group you can configure the list to send you text mails instead of html mails. Unfortunately, html mails are the
messageBody:
Adam Jack wrote:

> Yes, I am sorry about that. I think that the HTML (probably
> added by Yahoo groups so it could add a graphic
> advertisement) was just too much for me to overcome. I
> struggled to get control of the "text" I hoped I was
> editing/formatting but just fought the tool more than I won.
> I'd try to indent and paragraphs would just bounce all over
> the place out of my control. So much for "progress". I've
> zapped this one to be plain text and I will manually insert the >'s.

At your user account settings for this group you can configure the list
to send you text mails instead of html mails. Unfortunately, html mails
are the default - probably because of the advanced advertising
capabilities...

Regards, Ilja
